title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Learning Analytics for Data-Driven Learning Design Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistics and familiarity with fundamental concepts in curriculum design
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: One can derive curriculum design improvements using key features of learning analytics visualization tools.
One can design and apply formative assessment metrics based on learning data.
One can explain dashboard interface design principles aligned with educational contexts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
